video.title: Extreme Vacation Homes
video.synopsis: This show spans the globe to offer an insider's view of some of the most rarified, sumptuous and eccentric vacation homes in the world.

episodes.synopsis: Explore an ultra-modern retreat in Washington state, a luxurious Tuscan villa, a yellow castle in the Caribbean and an historic fortress in Britain.
episodes.title: Italy, Washington, Grenada

episodes.synopsis: Visit a 17th-century villa in Florence, a private island in the Florida Keys, a swanky home in the Hamptons and a hidden Caribbean fortress.
episodes.title: Grenadines & Florida Keys

episodes.synopsis: Tour a tree house for grownups in Thailand, a cave house in the Caribbean, an opulent retreat in Florence and a half-underground home in the Hamptons.
episodes.title: Grenada, Thailand, Hamptons

episodes.synopsis: Get an insider's view of a real rock 'n' roll castle in the Caribbean, a posh penthouse in Hong Kong, a haven in Barbados and a mansion in Malibu.
episodes.title: Malibu, Jamaica, Barbados and Hong Kong

episodes.synopsis: Visit a luxurious retreat in the Hamptons, a California mansion steeped in Hollywood history, a Miami castle with a moat and a lush Caribbean getaway.
episodes.title: Miami, Barbados, Hamptons

episodes.synopsis: Take a tour of an ancient city in Thailand, a villa in the Himalayas, a secret-filled mansion in Laguna Beach and a 19th-century fort in England.
episodes.title: Thailand, Laguna Beach, the UK

episodes.synopsis: Discover a sleek retreat off the coast of Washington state, a stone fortress in Italy, a sprawling villa in Jamaica and a lavish ski chalet in Canada.
episodes.title: Jamaica, Italy, Whistler

episodes.synopsis: Discover a lofty mountain retreat in Canada, a colorful haven in Malibu, a hideaway in the jungles of Thailand and a beachfront mansion in Miami.
episodes.title: Whistler, Malibu, Thailand
